review: Awesome product! Works well with very little setup required.  Not only is the video great, but it seems to me, that the audio stream (over optical input) sounds better than anything else I've connected to my home theater system.  The voice search button works as advertised.  I would recommend this to anyone.

author: Linda Giordano

review: The overall unit is slick and easy to setup. There are a couple things I wish would be improved. #1 Netflix App needs an update!!! Please Amazon, if you change this I feel more people would buy the unit to replace other streamers. I use both Amazon Prime and Netflix, but find myself going to other devices for Netflix as the experience is better. I don't think you want this, if people start to favour another device then they will not be using Fire Tv as much, and therefore you have less potential to sell them on Prime or Instant Video purchases.Don't be afraid of the competition, update this and add the IOS support for controlling you promised. This would make Fire Tv the ultimate Streamer, with the best Online content from Amazon and Netflix, its the Best of both Worlds on one device!The other improvement I'd like to see is more customizable menu options. In a new Firmware , you should add the ability to change the Home screen. For example Show only Prime Instant video thats free with Prime subscription! I am already paying for Netflix monthly and Prime yearly, so I am sorry Amazon but I am not going to purchase additional Movies. I will watch either service or use my Plex app!I see so much potential with this unit, I just hope it gets a few more improvements before it ends up in a Fire Sale, like your Fire Phone  ;) .
author: Scott McDonnell
